For those of you who may not have noticed one of the more recent posts, the=
re is a few changes that are coming. What I have done is opened us up to wh=
at would normally be an OOC meeting, where we would all get together and di=
scuss the future of the game, however I have elected to do it ICly. 

I kno=
w most poeple who are or have been active possesed at least one bot charact=
er. If you want to join in, feel free to insert your character and make a f=
ew comments. If you have only ever had Pred/Con characters, feel free to ma=
ke use of a temporary Max/Bot character for the purpose of the meeting. 

I=
 am encouraging everyone who wants to to get involved in what is going on, =
have a say in what will happen next. I have a few changes in mind, most of =
which were addressed in the opening post. But if you have any comments that=
 can be addressed ICly feel free to drop in. If you feel they can't feel fr=
ee to drop them on me off list. If you are someone who has never posted, pl=
ease come to me first and let me know what you intend. 

What I am doing wi=
ll not be something that wil be resolved over night. IE: if we resolve to s=
tart attacking the Unicronians, that does not mean that next week the battl=
e will be won and the game over. At the moment we are looking at what will =
be the general thrust of the game as we go forward, and as far as I am conc=
erned, anyone who is active or wants to be is entitled to a say. 

Come one=
, come all, feel free to post in. I look forward to seeing all IC. 

There =
is no need to comment directly to this post, unless you really want to. :)
=

Feel free to re-enter the game! The door is open! 

- Preston
